New Records: Sean Burke pitched two-hit ball over five innings
Key Match Events: Andrew Benintendi tied his career high with his 20th homer
Andrew Benintendi also doubled and scored two runs
Bryan Ramos added a solo homer for the White Sox
Jackson Jobe had a hitless three-inning relief stint and had his first two career strikeouts
Pre-Game Insights: Detroit manager A.J. Hinch said he didn't think there was a letdown after Friday's celebration
Hinch didn't think there was a letdown after Friday's celebration and said they will chalk this up and get through it and bounce back tomorrow
Post-Match Reflections: Detroit manager A.J. Hinch said they will chalk this up and get through it and bounce back tomorrow
Hinch didn't think there was a letdown after Friday's celebration
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game started 2 hours, 20 minutes late because of inclement weather
The White Sox won for the fourth time in a five-game span for only the second time this season
Detroit had two baserunners in each of the first two innings
Others: The White Sox will play the Tigers again on Sunday with Jonathan Cannon starting for the White Sox and a Tigers pitcher to be announced
